title: Bloomberg Markets: Harvey’s Toll on Houston Rising
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Harvey’s Toll on Houston Rising
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Joe Carroll Houston Bureau Chief Bloomberg Editorial Discussing a deluge of rain and rising floodwaters leaving Houston immersed and helpless, crippling a global center of the oil industry and testing the economic resiliency of a state that’s home to almost 1 in 12 U.S. workers.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
